of our complex variable mini

But all you needed
was one bad apple to spoil the whole
circle, so to speak. At any rate, I think that's
enough to make my point--

the point being that, by
studying complex series, we do two things.

One is we get a larger hold on
the set of analytic functions, which help us in things
like conformal mappings

and other things, which
we haven't gone into. And secondly, it gives
us a new perspective

at series involving
real power series, because we now have an
extra dimension from which

to view the power series. At any rate, we'll talk
about other aspects

of complex variables-- namely,
integration-- next time. For the time being, do the
exercises in this unit.
And until next time, goodbye.
